select biz_id AS bizId, operation_type AS operationType, db_table_name AS tableName, object_id AS domainKey, business_name AS businessName, operation_ip AS operationIp, gmt_modified AS operateDate, modifier AS operationUser from
where is_deleted = 0
AND gmt_modified >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND gmt_modified <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} <= gmt_modified <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND business_name like concat(concat('%',#{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and modifier like concat(concat('%',#{operationUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by gmt_modified desc
